topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55942f7a636872232e000074#post_55942f7a636872232e000074
I hate it when companies go the "healthy" route. First, they're certainly NOT healthier. Second, where's the good old taste of nostalgia?!
Many food I used to enjoy, are _meh_ to me now. Either it's because of my change in taste or the change in recipes.

Besides, people often take the "healthier" alternative as a false sense of security and often end up eating more than they should. Therefore, it sort of negates the "healthy" claim. It's psychology, marketers know it.
